title: Talk is cheap
body:
What is the best way to generate test data?

 Use doge ![doge pic](http://www.slate.com/content/dam/slate/articles/news_and_politics/the_slate_quiz/authorPortraits/pronounce_doge4.jpg.CROP.promovar-mediumlarge.jpg)
